00020 #include <cstddef> // NULL
00021 #include <boost/serialization/force_include.hpp>
00022 
00023 namespace boost {
00024 namespace serialization {
00025 namespace void_cast_detail{
00026 class void_caster;
00027 } // namespace void_cast_detail
00028 template<class Derived, class Base>
00029 BOOST_DLLEXPORT 
00030 inline const void_cast_detail::void_caster & void_cast_register(
00031     const Derived * dnull = NULL, 
00032     const Base * bnull = NULL
00033 ) BOOST_USED;
00034 } // namespace serialization
00035 } // namespace boost
00036 
00037 #endif // BOOST_SERIALIZATION_VOID_CAST_HPP
